column1: Because(A) the dog experiences decreasing(B) number of red blood cells, its(C) nose turns ashily(D).

column1: A raft of indicator(A) suggested that China’s economy is cooling(B) more rapidly(C) than had been thought(D).

column1: Bobby prefers to(A) drink green smoothies with(B) a drop of lemon than(C) vegetable juices to keep him healthy(D).
